configureApp.faceIdTitle: Log in with a Face ID
configureApp.faceIdDescription: Use Face ID instead of a passcode to log in. It is more secure.

configureApp.touchIdTitle: Log in with a Touch ID
configureApp.touchIdDescription: Use Touch ID instead of a passcode to log in. It is more secure.

configureApp.verifyIdentityMessage: If you ever lose access to your device, you can use this code to verify you identity.

configureApp.changeAppMessage: Google Authenticator app protects your withdrawals and Liber account

kyc1step.theTermsAnd: The terms and services which apply to you, will depend on your country of residence
kyc1step.byPressingSign: By pressing Sign up securely, you agree to our
kyc1step.yourData: . Your data will be securely encrypted with TLS

kyc2step.byLawWe: By law, we need your home address to open your account
kyc2step.flatSuiteUnit: Flat, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.

kyc3step.yourDocumentPhoto: Your document photo helps us prove your identity. It should match the information you have provided in the previous steps.

kyc4step.placePhoneOnTopOfPassport: Place your phone directly on top of passport and take a picture.
kyc4step.placePhoneOnTopOfIDFront: Place your phone directly on top of your ID back side and take a picture.
kyc4step.placePhoneOnTopOfIDBack: Place your phone directly on top of your ID front side and take a picture.

kyc5step.haveAFinal: Have a final check if all data is clearly visible and that it matches the information you have entered in previous steps.

kyc6step.provideOneOf: Provide one of the documents with an address and your legal name on it. The document requires an issue date in the last 3 months.
kyc6step.maintenanceBillsFrom: Maintenance bills from official companies (usually not more than three months old)

kyc7step.yourIdentityIs: Your identity is being verified. We will email and sms to you once your verification has completed.
